# Figures

```{r consortplot, echo = FALSE}
consort_plot(
    consort_df,
    orders = c(
        trialno = "Population",
        exc1 = "Exclusion",
        arm = "Analysis",
        trialno = "Survival analysis"
    ),
    allocation = "arm",
    side_box = "exc1"
)
```

```{r survplotml3, echo = FALSE}
plot(
    ml3$srv,
    mark.time = TRUE,
    lwd = 2,
    col = 1:2,
    main = "Thrombus free time",
    xlab = "time [days]",
    conf.int = TRUE
)
```

```{r survplotml5, echo = FALSE}
plot(
    ml5$srv,
    mark.time = TRUE,
    lwd = 2,
    col = 1:2,
    main = "Thrombus free time",
    xlab = "time [days]",
    conf.int = TRUE
)
```
